column1: There's a powerful source of magic coming from this place.
Show yourself! The one who caused the shooting star incident!
Not even Kage could stop you.
Why did you summon these meteors?
It's like the Miracle Mallet all over again…
This kind of thing has already happened before.
Some ill-intending youkai used the Miracle Mallet to overthrow the order of Gensokyo.
ᴵᵗ'ˢ ᵃᶫᶫ ˢᵉᶦʲᵃ'ˢ ᶠᵃᵘᶫᵗ﹔ ᶦᵗ'ˢ ᵃᶫᶫ ˢᵉᶦʲᵃ'ˢ ᶠᵃᵘᶫᵗ﹔ ᶦᵗ'ˢ ᵃᶫᶫ ˢᵉᶦʲᵃ'ˢ ᶠᵃᵘᶫᵗ﹔
ᶦᵗ'ˢ ᵃᶫᶫ ˢᵉᶦʲᵃ'ˢ ᶠᵃᵘᶫᵗ﹔ ᶦᵗ'ˢ ᵃᶫᶫ ˢᵉᶦʲᵃ'ˢ ᶠᵃᵘᶫᵗ﹔ ᶦᵗ'ˢ ᵃᶫᶫ ˢᵉᶦʲᵃ'ˢ ᶠᵃᵘᶫᵗ⋅
In short, I won't let the same thing happen a second time
Why would I wish for something like that?
The power coming from those meteorites is similar to the Miracle Mallet's.
I used it to become bigger once.
In order to achieve your dream, you'll need to pay a high price.
The price I need to pay for this seems to be great;
So you plan to sacrifice the lives of others for your goal;
is that part of your plan!?
Convert these shooting stars into magical power!
